That’s not true with Passive Optical LAN. This next-generation LAN solution certainly brings better performance: up to 1 Gb/s to every user. And its lightweight, flexible fiber-optic cabling is definitely quicker to deploy than the copper cabling needed for a traditional LAN.
But can it really be cheaper as well?
You bet!
